languages.text: {n}Согнав с лица неуместное более довольство, Соломон коротко кивает.{/n} "Я не желал вас оскорбить. Прошу прощения, уже удаляюсь".
{n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."
languages.original_text: {n}Согнав с лица неуместное более довольство, Соломон коротко кивает.{/n} "Я не желал вас оскорбить. Прошу прощения, уже удаляюсь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."
{n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

{n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."
{n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne nickt knapp und die Zufriedenheit verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nicht beleidigen. Tut mir leid. Ich gehe dann jetzt."
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne nickt knapp und die Zufriedenheit verschwindet aus seinem Gesicht.{/n} "Ich wollte Euch nicht beleidigen. Tut mir leid. Ich gehe dann jetzt."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se passe la main sur le visage, comme pour effacer la satisfaction qu'il arborait il y a encore un instant, puis hoche brièvement la tête.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, je ne voulais pas vous offenser. Je vous laisse. »
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se passe la main sur le visage, comme pour effacer la satisfaction qu'il arborait il y a encore un instant, puis hoche brièvement la tête.{/n} « Veuillez m'excuser, je ne voulais pas vous offenser. Je vous laisse. »

languages.text: {n}つい先ほどまでの満足げな表情を消し、ソロモーンは短くうなずいた。{/n}「あなたを不快にさせるつもりはありませんでした。すみませんでした。これで失礼します」
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}つい先ほどまでの満足げな表情を消し、ソロモーンは短くうなずいた。{/n}「あなたを不快にさせるつもりはありませんでした。すみませんでした。これで失礼します」

languages.text: {n}Borrando la alegría de su cara, Solomorne asiente brevemente.{/n} «No era mi intención ofender. Lo lamento, me marcharé de inmediato».
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Borrando la alegría de su cara, Solomorne asiente brevemente.{/n} «No era mi intención ofender. Lo lamento, me marcharé de inmediato».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙脸上满足的表情转瞬即逝，他简短地点了点头。{/n}“我并没有冒犯你的意思。我向你道歉，马上就走。”
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙脸上满足的表情转瞬即逝，他简短地点了点头。{/n}“我并没有冒犯你的意思。我向你道歉，马上就走。”

languages.text: {n}Yüzündeki son keyif emaresini de silerek başını hafifçe sallıyor.{/n} "Sizi gücendirmek istememiştim, özür dilerim. Hemen gidiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Wiping his recent contentment from his face, Solomorne nods briefly.{/n} "I did not wish to offend you. I apologise, I'll be on my way."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzündeki son keyif emaresini de silerek başını hafifçe sallıyor.{/n} "Sizi gücendirmek istememiştim, özür dilerim. Hemen gidiyorum."
